title: Geometric sans caps on Ginger & Rosa movie poster
content: This is an intriguing sans serif on the [poster for Ginger & Rosa](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818164314/http:/impawards.com/intl/uk/2012/ginger_and_rosa_xlg.html) (only the movie title). Anybody has an idea what this could be?
author: Bald Condensed
